nodes.title: Upgrade dependencies, Gradle plugin, SDK, and update README links

Added possibility to offset realm data to match view data

Handle exception while adding extra position in adapter
I need auto updated RealmRecyclerViewAdapter Example.
Fix wrong item index being returned

Now RealmBaseAdapter behaves as empty if the adapterData is not valid.
update build tools and android cradle plugin

merge changes in releases into master
Null the reference from the view to the adapter in onDestroy
Detaching adapter when view gets destroyed to prevent leaking adapter which observes a managed collection
Fixed crash of RealmRecyclerViewAdapter#updateData() when the adapterData in it was already invalid
Update Realm, Android SDK and build tool version.
Add a constructor of RealmBaseAdapter that does not take Context as an argument
Remove transitive dependency to realm-android-library in order to support realm-android-library-object-server
Add a Jenkinsfile and a Dockerfile
